Class RawTable

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RawTable(long id, int columns)
      Create a new RawTable with metadata set to null.

      Create a new RawTable with metadata set to a ByteBuffer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RawTable

        public RawTable(long id,
        int columns)
        Create a new RawTable with metadata set to null. metadata can later be set via setMetadata(java.nio.ByteBuffer).
        Parameters:
        id - table id
        columns - number of columns

      • RawTable

        public RawTable(long id,
        int columns,
        ByteBuffer metadata)
        Create a new RawTable with metadata set to a ByteBuffer.
        Parameters:
        id - table id
        columns - number of columns
        metadata - table metadata, if is null, the internal metadata is set to an empty buffer, otherwise, the provided buffer will be copied into the internal buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public long getId()

      • getColumns

        public int getColumns()

      • getMetadata

        public ByteBuffer getMetadata()

      • setMetadata

        public void setMetadata(ByteBuffer metadata)
        Set the table metadata. If the specified metadata is null, the internal metadata will be set to an empty byte buffer, otherwise, the provided metadata will be copied into the internal buffer.
        Parameters:
        metadata - the metadata to be set

      • toJournalEntry

        public JournalEntry toJournalEntry()
        Specified by:
        toJournalEntry in interface JournalEntryRepresentable
        Returns:
        the JournalEntry representing this object
